text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Good morning, everyone. The contest is only 6 days and 1 minute away.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Today's goal is to start and decide on a design. Thank you for your continued support.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: — Excuse me. One thing. I don't see Ms. Flower.

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Oh, sorry. She's coming after she puts on the ribbon. Maybe it took her a bit.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Ribbon…?

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Sorry I'm late!

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Um, Ms. Flash, Ms. Bourbon…! Please have these… I made it for you with Ms. Jordan's help.

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: You've been making us sweets, haven't you? I thought it could be helpful if you experienced receiving them for once.

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: And… umm, above all! Because I was happy to receive them.

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: It's only a few more days, but I look forward to them. … Thank you for inviting me.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: The pleasure is all mine. …Huhu, have I looked that austere?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ha ha! I expect no less of Ms. Flower! Ah, yes! Why don't you line them up with our sweets!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Oh, my God! Can I post this to Umasta?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: — Wonderful!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: — …Excuse me. I slipped into an 'excited' status. Flower, this is wonderful. I've had a "flash of inspiration".

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: Th- thank you! …ummm?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Expressing the "determination to win" — How about making a cupcake tower using these character cupcakes?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Tracen Acadmy's "determination to win" is represented through the various student-cupcakes, with the pedestal expressing "victory".

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: I see! That certainly allows us to express both, and it can be produced in time.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: A cupcake tower… Let us go with that! Thank you so much, Flower!

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: ! Oh, it's nothing! I'm just… glad to hear that. …Ehehe.
And thus began the final six days.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: The challenge is to differentiate each cupcake. Today, we will be studying cake design in this cafeteria.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Status "Thinking" — transitioned to "Inspired". How about using this tart as reference and making some of it out of non-sponge dough?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: I see! Like for example, using zuckerteig… hefeteig… — Cookie dough and yeast dough — might prove interesting.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: No, no, no! These glittery lamé cups are too gaudy to represent the students of Tracen Academy!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Chill girl, isn't fancy better?! You're thinking way too plain!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Absolutely not! A student must be pure, correct, and beautiful!

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: U-Uhmm! Why not use violet then? It would be like our uniforms…!

text_block_list.name: Both
text_block_list.text: … Sweet!! … Perfect!

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text: And this year's "Yuushun Chocolate Contest" is underway! Our passionate youngsters are going for it!

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text: We have a total of 17 teams competing this year! Which students will take home the grand prize — this prestigious crown! —The battle is on!

text_block_list.name: Tosen Jordan
text_block_list.text: Yeaah! Hit it!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Go full bakushin! Ms. Flash, Ms. Bourbon!

text_block_list.name: Nishino Flower
text_block_list.text: D-do your best…!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: …toi,toi,toi… whoo… Bourbon, the only thing to aim for is the top. … Let's do this.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Order accepted. We will do our best.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Bowl, whisk, cream, temperature — no problems. Setup complete. Start binding of fat globules.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Your skills have improved, Bourbon. …And I must get to work on the dough.

text_block_list.name: Event Commentator
text_block_list.text: Let's take a look at Tracen Academy next! It's still looking quite bland! What's your view on it?

text_block_list.name: Judge
text_block_list.text: Indeed… as a prestigious racing school, it's highly unusual to see them participating in the first place. I don't believe they have anything like confectionary courses.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Moving on to making the matcha cream. Referencing recipe page 2–3. … There is currently a slight deviation in the color code.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Then please add 1g of matcha and 4.2g of granulated sugar.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Understood. —Ms. Flash, the oven will complete preheating in 42 seconds.

text_block_list.name: Judge
text_block_list.text: Hmmm… their recipe looks complex. It gives me the feeling we might see it turn into something wonderful.
